snippet: Even in an era of belt-tightening, Amsterdam and Copenhagen are investing tens of millions of euros to handle -- and encourage -- ever-increasing bike traffic.
abstract: Even in an era of belt-tightening, Amsterdam and Copenhagen are investing tens of millions of euros to handle -- and encourage -- ever-increasing bike traffic.

headline.main: Making the Bike as Logical a Choice for Commuters as the Car, Bus, Train or Metro
